entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Infrastructure Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 7, 18:00 - 21:00 UTC

Mar 3, 09:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/03/2023 18:00 UTC
End time : 07/03/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing an infrastructure maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade except at one point.

entry.content:

Resolved - Start Time : 23/02/2023 04:00 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
